name: Homestar Runner Music Videos Quiz | Homestar Runner | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following videos was *not* produced or directed by The Cheat?
questions.explanation:
Theme Song Video.

	The Cheat makes and directs music videos (usually known, according to Strong Bad, for their poor voice quality and animation,) on his iMac, Tangerine Dreams.

questions.text: Undoubtedly, the most well-known music video at homestarrunner.com is "Everybody to the Limit," Strong Bad's challenge to the mysterious fhqwhgads. What did Strong Bad promise The Cheat for his fine work on this video?
options: A night in the crisper drawer
questions.explanation:
A pizza.

	This is probably the only video in which we see Strong Bad praise The Cheat's work.

questions.text: Who did Strong Bad say that he would "never, ever, ever, ever, ever, write a song about"?
questions.explanation:
Sibbie.

	However, as the email "Sibbie" shows, soon "Song about Sibbie," as well as its sequel, "I Freakin' Hate Sibbie!" were on every iPod and radio in Free Country, America.

questions.text: In one music video on the site, Coach Z implores us, "Give me a chance to"...
options: take the team to the Nationals
kick Strong Bad in the pants
questions.explanation:
do a hip-hop dance.

	Coach Z is an unlikely hip-hop star, but dresses up as a famous rap musician every Halloween. This video, "Hip-Hop Dance," follows the short toon "New Boots."

questions.text: Strong Bad produced a music CD, "Strong Bad Sings." On this CD, he sung "I'm so glad..."
options: I can kick Strong Sad's butt
questions.explanation:
The Cheat is not dead.

	Backed by gospel vocalists, he croons that,"I got mad at The Cheat For screwing up the Jumble Caper I hope I don't see his name in the paper In the obituaries Cause that would mean he's dead" This song was first performed in the Strong Bad Email "Caper."

questions.text: In "The Cheat Theme Song," what is the one thing The Cheat is not said to be?
options: The dude that moves to the beat
The guy with the yellow feet
The man that looks like The Cheat
questions.explanation:
The guy from "21 Jump Street".

	"21 Jump Street" was a late 80s-early 90s cop show drama. In the video, we are told, "Who's the guy from "21 Jump Street"?Not The CheatNot The Cheat"

questions.text: In his email, "Different Town," Strong Bad gives us his vision of how things would change in his town if he had the chance. According to the song, who would be underground in a box filled up with peas?
questions.explanation:
The King of Town.

	Also, according to the song, The Poopsmith could talk, Strong Sad would have horns and a tail, and Homestar couldn't hack it and would quit.

questions.text: What kind of song did Strong Bad write that had the refrain, "The system is down"?
questions.explanation:
Techno.

	In the email "Techno," he sang the song while The Cheat did a lightswitch rave.

questions.text: Several Homestar Runner videos feature holiday songs. What song does Strong Bad sing for Thanksgiving?
questions.explanation:
Some Stupid Turkey.

	The lyrics: Oh, I'm some stupid turkey, as stupid as they come.Cut off my head, stuff me with bread, go and suck your thumb!

questions.text: Although we've focused on Strong Bad and The Cheat, Marzipan is also well-known as a musician, along with her guitar Carol. The Cheat has also made a video of her- it's an Easter Egg in the Strong Bad Email "Marzipan." In this video, what name did The Cheat put on her guitar?
questions.explanation:
Carl.

	This video, "Oh Yeah," detailed Marzipan's dislike for Strong Bad.
